applicable_bodies: City Council and other City bodies using the Public Meeting Portal
description: Submit comments through the City Public Meeting Portal when comments are enabled for a meeting.
requirements_deadlines: Portal availability depends on meeting settings; follow portal instructions.

action_type: Sign up to speak at a public meeting
applicable_bodies: City Council and other City bodies using the Public Meeting Portal
description: Sign up to speak via the Public Meeting Portal if the meeting enables speaker registration.
requirements_deadlines: Speaker sign-up is only available when enabled for the meeting.

action_type: Speak at Planning Commission meeting (in person)
description: Public may speak in person at Planning Commission meetings; no sign-up required.
requirements_deadlines: Attend meeting in person; follow meeting procedures.

action_type: Submit written comment to Planning Commission
description: Written comments accepted via portal; must be received by noon the day before the meeting.
requirements_deadlines: Submit by noon the day before the meeting.

action_type: Submit public comment on a County Planning Commission case
description: Submit public comments through the Engage portal (account required).
requirements_deadlines: Create an account to submit comments.

action_type: Submit public comment to County Council
description: Email public comments to the County Council public-comments address.
requirements_deadlines: Send comment before meeting; check agenda for details.

description: Sign up for meeting/agenda notifications.
requirements_deadlines: Use the county sign-up form.

action_type: Public comment at CCSD Board meetings
description: Public comment session is provided at Board meetings; speakers register upon arrival.
requirements_deadlines: Register on arrival; comment time limits apply per policy.

action_type: Attend CCSD Committee of the Whole meeting
description: Committee of the Whole meetings are public but do not include public comment.
requirements_deadlines: Observe only; no public comment per policy.

action_type: Apply for appointment to a County board or commission
description: Submit application to serve on county boards/commissions.
requirements_deadlines: Applications accepted quarterly per county guidance.

description: Submit public records requests through the City FOIA portal.
requirements_deadlines: Follow portal instructions; response timelines governed by SC FOIA.

description: Submit public records requests through the County OneRequest portal.
requirements_deadlines: Follow portal instructions; response timelines governed by SC FOIA.

applicable_bodies: All SC public bodies (state and local)
description: Any person may request to inspect/copy public records; request should be in writing with sufficient detail.
requirements_deadlines: Agency must respond within 10 business days for records <24 months old, 20 business days for older; production within 30/35 business days respectively.

description: Request minutes, recordings, and other public meeting records under SC FOIA.
requirements_deadlines: Use FOIA request process; deadlines per SC FOIA.

applicable_bodies: South Carolina judges (and lawyers) via ODC
description: Submit a signed, written complaint to the Office of Disciplinary Counsel.
requirements_deadlines: Complaints must be in writing and signed; email not accepted.

applicable_bodies: Public officials and filers under state ethics laws
description: File a complaint using the State Ethics Commission complaint form.
requirements_deadlines: Complaint form required; commission does not accept electronic submissions; transcripts available at requestor expense.

action_type: File complaint with State Inspector General
description: Submit complaint about improper governmental activity to the Office of the Inspector General.
requirements_deadlines: Online form or mail submission per OIG guidance.

description: Use LLR complaint forms for licensed professionals and businesses regulated by LLR.
requirements_deadlines: Select appropriate board and follow complaint instructions.

description: Submit consumer complaint to the Department of Consumer Affairs.
requirements_deadlines: Online or paper complaint form per SCDCA guidance.

description: Submit complaint to the CPD Office of Internal Affairs.
requirements_deadlines: Follow CPD Internal Affairs complaint process.

description: Submit complaint to the Sheriff’s Office of Professional Standards.
requirements_deadlines: Use online complaint form or contact OPS.

description: Use FOIA.gov to submit requests to federal agencies.
requirements_deadlines: Agency-specific FOIA rules apply; portal routes requests.

description: Find the appropriate IG hotline and submit a complaint.
requirements_deadlines: Use the IG directory to locate hotline instructions.

applicable_bodies: Federal judges (Judicial Conduct and Disability Act)
description: Submit a complaint following U.S. Courts guidance and forms.
requirements_deadlines: Submit to appropriate circuit; follow form instructions.

action_type: Attend City of Charleston board/commission meetings (Agenda Center)
applicable_bodies: City boards/commissions/committees listed in Agenda Center
description: Use the Agenda Center to find meeting dates and attend public meetings; public comment depends on the body and agenda.
requirements_deadlines: Check the Agenda Center and the meeting agenda for participation rules and deadlines.

applicable_bodies: City boards/commissions/committees listed in Agenda Center
description: Download agendas and minutes from the Agenda Center for City boards and committees.
requirements_deadlines: No deadline; agendas/minutes are posted as available.

description: Attend public meetings of Charleston County boards and commissions; check Board Manager for schedules.
requirements_deadlines: Meeting schedules vary by board; check Board Manager portal or contact Deputy Clerk.

action_type: Apply for appointment to Charleston County board
description: Submit application to serve on county boards/commissions via Board Manager.
requirements_deadlines: Applications accepted quarterly; current deadline per Board Manager.
